md:
giải nghĩa từ "textbooks" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

* Textbooks: (noun) - sách giáo khoa
	+ Meaning: Books used for teaching and learning in a classroom.
	+ Example sentence: "The teacher asked the students to bring their textbooks to class."
	+ Related words: school, education, learning, classroom
	+ Antonyms: fiction books, novels, entertainment books

* Textbooks: (noun) - sách giáo khoa
	+ Meaning: Books that contain information and explanations about a particular subject.
	+ Example sentence: "The math textbooks were very helpful for the students who were struggling with the concept."
	+ Related words: manual, guide, reference, instruction
	+ Antonyms: novels, stories, fiction books

* Textbooks: (noun) - sách giáo khoa
	+ Meaning: Books that are used as a standard or official source of information.
	+ Example sentence: "The textbooks provided by the government were used in all public schools."
	+ Related words: official, standard, authorized, approved
	+ Antonyms: unofficial, unauthorized, unapproved

  • Textbooks: (noun) - sách giáo khoa
